DOC.brief_title: A Phase II Study Anlotinib MTC Patients
DOC.criteria: 1.late medullary thyroid carcinoma ; 2.1870years , ECOG:02 , Expected survival period > 3 month ; 3.Calcitonic≥500pg/ml , thyroid function normal ; 4.HB≥100g/L , ANC ( Absolute Neutrophil Count ) ≥1.5×109/L；PLT 80×109/L , BIL/Cr normal range , ALT/AST ( aspartate aminotransferase ) ≤1.5*ULN ( hepatic metastasis , ALT/AST ( aspartate aminotransferase ) ≤5*ULN ) ; TG≤ 3.0mmol/L，cholesterol≤7.75mmol/L ; LVEF LLN . 5.Username contraceptive study 6 month ; 6.Volunteer . 1.Received vascular endothelial growth inhibitor type target therapy ; 2.Subject diagnose The second cancer ; 3.Participated clinical trial four week ; 4.Received radiotherapy chemotherapy treatment four week ; 5.With AE > 1 ; 6.Has influence oral drug ; 7.Brain metastasis , spinal cord compression , cancerous meningitis , brain/soft meningeal disease patient ; 8.Any serious fail control disease 9.Artery/venous thrombotic ; 10.Coagulant function abnormality ; 11.Arteriovenous thrombosis event ; 12.History psychiatric drug abuse mental disorder ; 13.Immunodeficiency history ; 14.Concomitant disease .
